title: Screenshot doesn't work. I have tried online offline power button holding power button and volume no
content:
I have no screenshot. I have tried holding power button, power button and volume, and even asking assistant. I've tried all three of these well on Wi-Fi LTE and even offline(safe mode) I want my f****** screenshot back. It's been 2 weeks without it if not more.
And don't even tell me to do a factory restart cuz I've already done that as well
